quote: After working with Nicci on two feature films and over a dozen ads, I wouldn't work with anyone else. She's the most hard-working, inspiring, knowledgeable and shrewd casting director out there -- and she does it all with a smile'
Nicci is highly professional and hugely creative in her casting approach. She always pulls it out the bag with new faces and brilliant performers and she is a joy to work with.

Nicci found us some incredible cast across three short films that we were shooting back-to-back.  The plethora of talent Nicci introduced us to was amazing.  One of the films has since earned her a CDA awarded, which was very well deserved.
Nicci is highly professional and hugely creative in her casting approach. She always pulls it out the bag with new faces and brilliant performers and she is a joy to work with.
